title: Caramelized Onion Pasta

instructions.text: Cut onion into julienne strips. Dice garlic. Chop basil. Cut pepper.
Melt butter on skillet and add onion. Cook on medium heat with salt and pepper for 25-35 minutes until onions are golden and caramely.
Near end of onion cooking, bring a pot of salted water to boil. Cook pasta and drain.
Add garlic and peppers to skillet with onion. Cook until peppers brown slightly (5-10 minutes).
Add pasta, basil, and parmesan to skillet. Cook until cheese melted, than another couple minutes.
Top with more basil and parmesan, and serve.

notes: The original recipe contained tomatoes. I wasn't a fan in this dish, but peppers are pretty good!
